dcterms:creator: H. Yannakoudakis
Ø. E. Andersen
A. Geranpayeh
T. Briscoe
D. Nicholls
dcterms:description: A publicly-released set of essays written by non-native learners of English taking a language assessment exam, annotated with spans of language errors, types of errors, and suggested corrections.
dcterms:title: First Certificate in English (FCE) dataset

dcterms:creator: H. T. Ng
S. M. Wu
T. Briscoe
C. Hadiwinoto
R. H. Susanto
C. Bryant
dcterms:description: A dataset of English essays written by advanced undergraduate students, annotated by two experienced annotators with error annotations.
dcterms:title: CoNLL 2014 shared task on GEC

dcterms:creator: C. Napoles
K. Sakaguchi
J. Tetreault
dcterms:description: A dataset containing essays written by a range of English learners with different first languages and proficiency levels, annotated with fluency and grammar edits.
dcterms:title: Johns Hopkins University (JHU) FLuency-Extended GUG Corpus (JFLEG)

dcterms:creator: C. Bryant
M. Felice
Ø. E. Andersen
T. Briscoe
dcterms:description: A collection of texts written by learners of English of varying levels of proficiency, submitted for assessment to an automated online tool for writing feedback.
dcterms:title: Cambridge English Write & Improve (W&I) corpus

dcterms:creator: S. Granger
dcterms:description: A corpus originally compiled at the Centre for English Corpus Linguistics, comprising essays written by native English students.
dcterms:title: LOCNESS corpus

dcterms:creator: C. Bryant
M. Felice
Ø. E. Andersen
T. Briscoe
dcterms:description: Development and test sets released as part of the BEA 2019 shared task on grammatical error correction.
dcterms:title: BEA 2019 shared task development and test sets
